robo_cup_state_space.hpp
1 #pragma once
2 
3 #include <rj_common/field_dimensions.hpp>
4 #include <rj_geometry/point.hpp>
5 #include <rj_geometry/shape_set.hpp>
6 #include <rrt/2dplane/PlaneStateSpace.hpp>
7 
8 namespace planning {
9 
13 class RoboCupStateSpace : public RRT::StateSpace<rj_geometry::Point> {
14 public:
15  RoboCupStateSpace(const FieldDimensions& dims,
16  const rj_geometry::ShapeSet& obstacles)
17  : field_dimensions_(dims), obstacles_(obstacles) {}
18 
19  rj_geometry::Point randomState() const override {
20  double x = field_dimensions_.floor_width() * (drand48() - 0.5f);
21  double y = field_dimensions_.floor_length() * drand48() -
22  field_dimensions_.border();
23  return rj_geometry::Point(x, y);
24  }
25 
26  double distance(const rj_geometry::Point& from,
27  const rj_geometry::Point& to) const override {
28  return from.dist_to(to);
29  }
30 
31  bool stateValid(const rj_geometry::Point& state) const override {
32  // note: obstacles_ contains obstacles that define the limits of the
33  // field, so we shouldn't have to check separately that the point is
34  // within the field boundaries.
35 
36  return !obstacles_.hit(state);
37  }
38 
39  rj_geometry::Point intermediateState(const rj_geometry::Point& source,
40  const rj_geometry::Point& target,
41  double step_size) const override {
42  auto dir = (target - source).norm();
43  return source + dir * step_size;
44  }
45 
46  rj_geometry::Point intermediateState(const rj_geometry::Point& source,
47  const rj_geometry::Point& target,
48  double min_step_size,
49  double max_step_size) const override {
50  throw std::runtime_error("Adaptive stepsize control not implemented");
51  }
52 
53  bool transitionValid(const rj_geometry::Point& from,
54  const rj_geometry::Point& to) const override {
55  // Ensure that @to doesn't hit any obstacles that @from doesn't. This
56  // allows the RRT to start inside an obstacle, but prevents it from
57  // entering a new obstacle.
58  for (const auto& shape : obstacles_.shapes()) {
59  if (shape->hit(rj_geometry::Segment(from, to)) && !shape->hit(from))
60  return false;
61  }
62  return true;
63  }
64 
65 private:
66  const rj_geometry::ShapeSet& obstacles_;
67  const FieldDimensions field_dimensions_;
68 };
69 
70 } // namespace planning
